together.description: Start a discord together session with your friends

activity.name: activity
activity.description: Thea ctivity you want to start

together.embed_description: This command allows you to start a discord together session with your friends. Just select the activity from the dropdown menu and invitation will be sent to start the session.
together.not_in_voice: You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.
together.error: An error occured while trying to start the activity. Maybe your activity does not exist
